title: Courage of the Heart
description: Adam Sherman has guarded the dark secrets of his past. Davie Prescott is the one person he doesn't have to hide from. When his past catches up to him, he learns that there's a lot more at stake. Adam is prepared to give Davie up in order to protect her until he learns that she's got a secret of her own.This is an updated re-release.
author: Chelle Cordero
